user_question: How can a consulting firm effectively use AI to improve client engagement?
final_answer: A consulting firm can use AI to improve client engagement by implementing AI-driven analytics to personalize client interactions, using chatbots for 24/7 support, and employing AI tools to predict client needs and tailor services accordingly.
